articles.author: Emily Mae  Czachor
articles.title: Disney cast member recovering after videos show runaway boulder at Indiana Jones show - CBS News
articles.description: A staffer at Walt Disney World in Florida is recovering after being struck and injured by a fake boulder that rolled off stage during a live performance, Disney said.
articles.content: A staffer at Walt Disney World is recovering, a Disney spokesperson said, after videos showed a fake boulder rolling off its track during a live show at the Florida theme park and striking an employe… [+1593 chars]
